14-06-04 rev4a: little change in disclaimer. no need to update
14-02-08 rev4: moved the submit button where it's supposed to be for logged out users, un-hided mobile apps buttons
13-04-30 rev 3: minor changes
12-07-23 REV 2: Finally fixed that damn Firefox bug.
12-07-21 REV 1: Fully working in Chrome. I wonder why it isn't showing right on Firefox.
